sentence.Network_en: For weeks now the government has been paralysed by indecision.
sentence.Network_cn: 到现在，政府因为无力决断已经陷入瘫痪达数周。

sentence.Network_en: Their indecision has been replaced by confidence and steely determination.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的优柔寡断已经被自信和钢铁般的决心所取代。

sentence.Network_en: The team has been plagued by indecision and internal divisions.
sentence.Network_cn: 优柔寡断与内部分裂深深困扰着该团队。

PerfectNetExp.abs: “优柔寡断”用英文怎么说？_百度知道 ...  indecision 优柔寡断 indecision 犹豫不决；踌躇.
indecipherable 难辨认的indecision 犹豫indecorum 失礼的言行
indebtedness 受惠；负债indecision 犹豫不决；无决断力indeep 弧间海槽
SAT常考单词_百度文库 ... gullible 易受骗的 indecision 优柔寡断；迟疑不决 inquisitive 好奇的.

list.abs: " Maybe " is an indecisive answer ., " 也许 " 是个不明确的回答.
That is why fears of an indecisive election result have been blighting the pound ., 这就是一个悬而未决的政治选举所导致的对英镑的大的影响.
a review on types of career indecision ., 生涯未决类型研究述评.
an indecisive contest ; an indecisive battle非决定性的竞赛；非决定性的战役
An indecisive contest ; an indecisive battle ., 非决定性的竞赛 ; 非决定性的战役.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French indécision, from in- (expressing negation) + décision, from Latin decisio(n-), from the verb decidere (see decide)

entry.tran: 优柔寡断;无决断力;迟疑不决
entry.def: If you say that someone suffers from indecision, you mean that they find it very difficult to make decisions.

example.ex: After months of indecision, the government gave the plan the go-ahead on Monday...
example.tran: 经过几个月的迟疑不决,政府在周一批准了这项计划。

example.ex: The team has been plagued by indecision and internal divisions.
example.tran: 优柔寡断与内部分裂深深困扰着该团队。

means.word_mean: 1. doubt concerning two or more possible alternatives or courses of action;

sentences.sentence: "his indecision was only momentary but the opportunity was lost"

means.word_mean: 2. the trait of irresolution; a lack of firmness of character or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "the king's incurable indecisiveness caused turmoil in his court"

auth_sentence.content: This may have contributed to indecision about their political future.
auth_sentence.res_content: This may have contributed to indecision about their political future.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This may have contributed to indecision about their political future.

auth_sentence.content: "People just view it as indecision," she says.
auth_sentence.res_content: "People just view it as indecision," she says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "People just view it as indecision," she says.

auth_sentence.content: Or, as the armchair generals would say, the right indecision.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or, as the armchair generals would say, the right indecision.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or, as the armchair generals would say, the right indecision.

Sentence.sentence: That sounds like a great thing, but as a recent study has shown, too many choices can make us confused, unhappy, even paralyzed with indecision.

means.word_mean: 迟疑不决, 无决断力, 优柔寡断

sentences.en: He halted before the door in indecision.
sentences.cn: 他在门前犹豫不决地停了下来。
